name: Thick Fat
summary: Halves damage from Fire and Ice-type moves.
viability: This is what allows Mega Venusaur to be such a great bulky Pok√©mon. It loses two weaknesses, leaving it only with Flying and Psychic-type weakness. In addition, not having to take as much damage from Ice-type moves, which are very common, is helpful when it comes to being a defensive stalwart. Snorlax is one of the best Specially Defensive walls for that reason.
